statements: SELECT * FROM Intellectual_Property;
SELECT name, author, royalty FROM Intellectual_Property;
SELECT * FROM Intellectual_Property WHERE permission_required = True;
SELECT author, name FROM Intellectual_Property ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT name, license_expiry FROM Intellectual_Property WHERE royalty > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Intellectual_Property WHERE royalty > 100.00 ORDER BY name DESC, author ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, author FROM Intellectual_Property WHERE permission_required = TRUE ORDER BY license_expiry ASC
SELECT id, name, author, royalty FROM Intellectual_Property WHERE license_expiry < '2022-01-01' AND usage_description LIKE '%software%'
SELECT name, author, royalty FROM Intellectual_Property ORDER BY royalty ASC, name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Intellectual_Property WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE '%B' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property_usage WHERE royalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, usage_start_date, usage_end_date FROM intellectual_property_usage;
SELECT * FROM licensing_permission WHERE permission_type = 'Commercial';
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) AS total_usage FROM intellectual_property_usage GROUP BY owner_id;
SELECT licensee_id, permission_type, permission_start_date FROM licensing_permission ORDER BY permission_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property_usage WHERE royalty_amount > 1000 ORDER BY usage_start_date DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name, owner_id FROM intellectual_property_usage WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM licensing_permission WHERE permission_type LIKE '%public%' AND permission_end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, asset_id, licensee_id FROM licensing_permission WHERE licensee_id = '98765432-10fe-edcb-a987-6543210fedcb';
SELECT COUNT(id) as total_licenses, permission_type FROM licensing_permission GROUP BY permission_type ORDER BY total_licenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property;
SELECT name, author FROM intellectual_property WHERE license = 'MIT';
SELECT id, name, author, license FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT * FROM royalties WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, user_id, access_level FROM permissions WHERE intellectual_property_id = 'f36174e2-6434-4c1a-8c78-144de898e320';
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property;
SELECT name, author FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM royalties WHERE royalty_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, author, license FROM intellectual_property WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY intellectual_property_id;
SELECT * FROM IntellectualProperty;
SELECT property_name, owner_name FROM IntellectualProperty ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, property_name, owner_name, license_type FROM IntellectualProperty WHERE license_type = 'Copyright';
SELECT * FROM Royalties WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY royalty_date ASC;
SELECT id, licensee_name, permission_type FROM Permissions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, property_name, owner_name FROM IntellectualProperty WHERE license_type = 'Copyright';
SELECT * FROM Permissions WHERE permission_type = 'Usage' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT property_name, creation_date FROM IntellectualProperty WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Royalties WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY royalty_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT licensee_name FROM Permissions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property;
SELECT name, creator, creation_date FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, royalties FROM intellectual_property WHERE royalties > 1000 ORDER BY royalties ASC;
SELECT * FROM licensing WHERE license_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT licensee, license_fee FROM licensing WHERE license_end_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, creator, royalties FROM intellectual_property ORDER BY royalties DESC;
SELECT id, name, creator, royalties FROM intellectual_property WHERE royalties > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM licensing WHERE license_start_date < '2022-01-01' AND license_end_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, permission_type, issuer FROM permissions WHERE expiration_date < '2022-06-30';
